1: Yahweh is my shepherd; I will lack nothing.\q
2:
He makes me to lie down in green pastures;\q he leads me beside tranquil water.


\q
3:
He brings back my life;\q he guides me along right paths for his name's sake.


\q
6: Surely goodness and covenant faithfulness will pursue me all the days of my life;\q and I will live in the house of Yahweh for a very long time!
